flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Teresa and Morio is 71 - 59 = <<71-59=9>>9 years.
When their daughter is born, Teresa is 38 - 9 = <<38-9=29>>29 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
